Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Mastoparan-VT7 (Ala-rich; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: venom gland, the social wasp,Vespa tropica

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against Gram-positive S. aureus ATCC25923 (MIC 10 uM), E. faecalis ATCC29212 (MIC 5 uM), S. aureus IS 10# (MIC 40 uM), S. aureus IS 37# (MIC 10 uM), Gram-negative E.coli ATCC25922 (MIC >160 uM), E.cloacae ATCC13047 (MIC >160 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC700603 (MIC 80 uM), B. pyocyaneus CMCCB1010 (MIC 80 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC27853 (MIC 80 uM), B.dysenteriae (MIC >160 uM), E. coli IS 37# (MIC 80 uM),  E. coli IS 117# (MIC 40 uM),  E. coli IS 218# (MIC 40 uM), P. aeruginosa IS 350# (MIC 10 uM), K.pneumoniae IS 59# (MIC >160 uM), fungi C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 80 uM), C. albicans ATCC90028 (MIC 20 uM), and  C.parapsilosis ATCC22019 (MIC >160 uM). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Yang X, Wang Y, Lee WH, Zhang Y.2013
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from the venom gland of the social wasp Vespa tropica.
